archimate:Product.name: ccNetViz
archimate:Product.documentation: ccNetViz: a lightweight JavaScript library for large network graphs visualization using WebGL. It is an open source library available under GPLv3 License developed in the Helikar Lab. at https://helikarlab.github.io/ccNetViz/ Looks great. Force layout graphs, but without dynamic attraction visualization as vis.js Animations is an interesting feature to assess. How to include icons or images? Seems also missing.
